_comment_MODEL_LOCATION: Path to the directory containing the trained models.
_comment_GLOBAL_DEVICE: Device to be used for computation (e.g., 'cuda' or 'cpu').
_comment_OUTPUT_DIR: Directory where the output will be saved.
_comment_reproducible: Whether to make the process reproducible. (Using a fixed 64x64 triangular noise for dithering)
_comment_save_std: Whether to save the per-pixel standard deviation.
_comment_save_CI: Whether to save the per-pixel confidence intervals (90%).
_comment_save_orig_logit: Whether to save the original logits produced by the model, can be used to calculate probabilities of each bin.
_comment_max_parallel_workers: Set only if run in parallel, suggest to be # of cpus of your machine, turn down if have memory issue
_comment_postprocessing_mode: Choose from ['none', 'generate_mask', 'fix_hole_overwrite', 'fix_hole_save_to_new'], for producing aB/Inclination/Azimuth only, please set to none to avoid any issue
